alert.note: Alert for Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 11 at 12:58AM EDT until September 11 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: The National Weather Service in Key West has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lower Keys in Monroe County in Florida... * Until 130 AM EDT. * At 1258 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Boca Chica, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Key West, Big Coppitt Key, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Boca Chica, Key Haven, Geiger Key and Shark Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 4 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
